short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly read and forward localStorage and cookies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
中文介绍：
使用该扩展可以一键读取当前页面的本地数据和Cookie，
然后发送到配置好的目标路径，并自动打开、刷新目标页面。
支持多目标路径配置、支持自定义读写字段和镜像模式、Cookie转存可选。

新增功能：
1、避免重复打开扩展置页面；
2、增加扩展页面直达按钮和打赏功能；
谢谢大家的支持！


English introduction:
This extension can read the localStorage and cookies of the current page, 
Then send it to the configured destination path, and automatically open and refresh the destination page. 
Support multi-destination path configuration, support custom read and write fields and mirror mode, Cookie transfer is optional.

What's New: 
1. Avoid repeatedly opening the extension page.
2. Add the extension page direct button and reward function.
Thank you all for your support!
